statements: SELECT * FROM face_recognition_data;
SELECT face_id, image_url FROM face_recognition_data;
SELECT face_id, face_vector FROM face_recognition_data WHERE face_id > 100;
SELECT face_id, image_url, image_metadata FROM face_recognition_data WHERE image_url LIKE '%face%';
SELECT * FROM face_recognition_data WHERE face_vector[1] > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM face_recognition_data WHERE face_id = 1;
SELECT face_id, image_url FROM face_recognition_data WHERE face_vector[1] > 0.5;
SELECT face_id, image_metadata->>'name' AS person_name FROM face_recognition_data WHERE image_metadata->'age' > '30';
SELECT face_id, image_url FROM face_recognition_data WHERE face_vector[2] < ALL(SELECT face_vector FROM face_recognition_data);
SELECT AVG(face_vector[1]) AS avg_vector, COUNT(*) AS total_faces FROM face_recognition_data;
SELECT * FROM face_vectors;
SELECT id, vector FROM face_vectors ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT vector FROM face_vectors WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, vector, created_at FROM face_vectors WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT image_name, image_path FROM image_metadata;
SELECT * FROM face_vectors WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, vector, created_at FROM face_vectors WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT image_id, image_name FROM image_metadata WHERE face_vector_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY image_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM face_vectors WHERE id BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT image_id, image_path FROM image_metadata WHERE image_name LIKE '%profile%' AND image_path LIKE '%.png' ORDER BY image_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM face_vectors ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT vector FROM face_vectors WHERE id = 10;
SELECT image_id, created_at FROM image_metadata WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT id, vector_id, confidence FROM face_recognition WHERE confidence > 0.8 ORDER BY confidence DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM face_vectors JOIN face_recognition ON face_vectors.id = face_recognition.vector_id WHERE face_vectors.id = 5;
SELECT * FROM face_vectors WHERE id = 1;
SELECT vector FROM face_vectors WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, created_at FROM image_metadata WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT vector_id, image_id, confidence FROM face_recognition WHERE confidence > 0.8 ORDER BY confidence DESC;
SELECT image_id, COUNT(*) FROM face_recognition GROUP BY image_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT * FROM FaceVectors;
SELECT image_name, image_path FROM ImageMetadata WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, action FROM RecognitionLogs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT face_id, image_id, vector_id FROM FaceData WHERE face_id > 5;
SELECT id, vector FROM FaceVectors WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM FaceVectors ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT image_name, image_path FROM ImageMetadata WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM FaceData WHERE vector_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY face_id ASC;
SELECT image_name, image_path FROM ImageMetadata WHERE image_id = 2;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, action FROM RecognitionLogs WHERE result = 'success';
SELECT * FROM face_vectors;
SELECT face_id, vector FROM face_vectors WHERE face_id = 1;
SELECT image_id, image_path, image_width, image_height FROM image_metadata ORDER BY image_width DESC;
SELECT face_id, image_id FROM face_images WHERE face_id = 2 AND image_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'john_doe%';
SELECT * FROM face_vectors;
SELECT image_path, image_width, image_height FROM image_metadata WHERE image_width > 100;
SELECT u.username, uv.vector FROM users u JOIN user_faces uf ON u.user_id = uf.user_id JOIN face_vectors uv ON uf.face_id = uv.face_id;
SELECT i.image_path, count(uf.user_id) as num_users FROM image_metadata i JOIN face_images fi ON i.image_id = fi.image_id JOIN user_faces uf ON fi.face_id = uf.face_id GROUP BY i.image_path;
SELECT f.face_id, f.vector, u.username FROM face_vectors f JOIN user_faces uf ON f.face_id = uf.face_id JOIN users u ON uf.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.username = 'john_doe';
